SensorEntry - Class in arduino_simulator.sensors
class contains basic sensor's requirements for functioning, its limitations and similary, basically it is kind of metadata for sensor part of this data is shared on the initial handshake performed when we connect to the device driver
SensorEntry(SensorType, int, int) - Constructor for class arduino_simulator.sensors.SensorEntry
As driver developer use this class
SensorEntry(SensorType, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class arduino_simulator.sensors.SensorEntry
 
SensorImpl - Class in arduino_simulator.sensors
If you want to define a new sensor for testing as driver developer extend this class when implementing it, pass appropriate sensor type to constructor.
SensorServerManager - Class in driver_framework
instance of this class is to be used by driver developer in order to start providing communicatino with Android device

START_READ - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.request.Request
 
START_READ_N - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | START_READ | - - - - | This response is given if data is available for reading.
START_READ_Y - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | START_READ | - - - - | This response is given if data is available for reading.
STOP_READ - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.request.Request
 
STOP_READ_N - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | STOP_READ | response informs that that pausing reading was not possible, this may be due to some system error / unresponsivenes Response = | STOP_READ_N | - - - - |
STOP_READ_Y - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | STOP_READ | response informs that reading paused ( ideally, this will almost always execute ) Response = | STOP_READ_Y | - - - - |
